p: For TTO alone we used 3%, 2%, 1%, 0.5%, and 0.25% v/ v whereas when tested in combination with OXA, we used the following concentrations: OXA 2 μg/mL (0.06 × MIC), OXA 1 μg/mL (0.03 × MIC), OXA 2 μg/mL (0.06 × MIC) + TTO 0.5%, OXA 2 μg/mL (0.06 × MIC) + TTO 0.25%, OXA 1 μg/mL (0.03 × MIC) + TTO 0.25%, OXA 1 μg/mL (0.03 × MIC) + TTO 0.25%.
